mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT owner FROM Owner owner left join fetch owner.pets WHERE owner.lastName LIKE #{lastName}+'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO owners ( id, first_name, last_name, address, city, telephone ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{address}, #{city}, #{telephone} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE first_name=#{firstName}, last_name=#{lastName}, address=#{address}, city=#{city}, telephone=#{telephone};
